Name: First Battle of El Alamein
Text: British prevention of a second advance by the Axis forces into Egypt.

Name: Battle of Okinawa
Text: Capture of the Island Okinawa by American forces.

Name: Battle of the Philippine Islands
Text: American and Filipino campaign to defeat and expel Japanes forces in the Philippines.

Name: Battle of Leyte Gulf
Text: Largest naval battle in WW2. Attempt of the United States to isolate Japanese forces from the countries it.had occupied in Southeast Asia.

Name: Battle of Iwo Jima
Text: Attempt to capture the Island Iwo Jima to use its airports.

Name: Battle of Moscow
Text: Battle at the 600km Eastern Front and Germanys attempt to capture Moscow.

Name: Siege of Leningrad
Text: Axis siege on Leningrad. Longest and most distructive siege in history.

Name: Battle of Berlin
Text: The final major offensive of the European theatre of World War II.

Name: Battles of Khalkhin Gol
Text: The decisive engagements of the undeclared Soviet-Japanese border conflicts.

Name: Battle of Monte Cassino
Text: With intention to break through to Rome, the Allies forces attackes the Winter Line in Italy held by Axis forces.

Name: Battle of the Bulge
Text: Last big German offensive action. Attemt to take back the harbour of Antwerpen.

Name: Battle of the Coral Sea
Text: Battle beween Japanese and US forces. Most of the fighting was done with the help of aircraft carriers.
